name: Complete Retro Skateboard
description: (Original price $50) Tiger Skateboards are the skateboards that all kids are raving about. Bringing back the retro look, Tiger Boards Complete Skateboard features a high quality plastic deck with a unique hexagon pattern for traction. Tiger Boards are made from the finest components including 78a wheels, aluminum colored trucks with 90a bushings, and high speed stainless steel Abec-7 bearings. You can even customize your Tiger Board with additional wheel colors and trucks.

name: Microsoft Selfie Stick
description: I have multiple of this, I have been using this and I like it a lot
